item.title: CVE-2024-44015|2024-10-08T15:41:18.733Z -- users%20control -- users%20control
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Users Control allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Users Control: from n/a through 1.0.16.
